name: Amalgamation Operation
description:
Fix the wounds of a human amalgamation in Amalgamation Operation! This game was created in 48 hours for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam with the theme “joined together.” I have improved significantly since last year’s jam, so I’m excited to see what everyone thinks!

Tutorial Text

Here’s the text from the tutorial, in case you forgot:

As you may have heard on the news, people are joining together. They cannot treat their damaged skin, so it’s our job to help them! Click an item to pick it up, then click an injury to heal it. This heals this and this heals this. For wounds, you get skin, click the mesher, and click the wound. There is a time limit in each round. In that time, you must heal this many injuries. Thank you, and good luck!
